short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A citation tool for SO& citation style

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SO Easy CiteMate is a powerful and user-friendly citation generator designed to support the SO& citation style. 
This extension only works on pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov.
